testcase.name: Users can view restricted resources for which they are authorised
testcase.system-out: Given a new browser or client instance......................................passed And the client/browser is configured to use an intercepting proxy...........passed And the proxy logs are cleared..............................................passed And the login page..........................................................passed And the username bob is used................................................passed And the password password is used...........................................passed When the user logs in.......................................................passed And the proxy logs are cleared..............................................passed And the HTTP requests and responses are recorded............................passed And they access the restricted resource: viewBobsProfile....................passed Then the string: Robert should be present in one of the HTTP responses......passed

testcase.name: Users must not be able to view resources for which they are not authorised

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: <false> but: was <true> at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20) at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:8) at net.continuumsecurity.steps.WebApplicationSteps.checkAccessUsingCookieMethod(WebApplicationSteps.java:491) at net.continuumsecurity.steps.WebApplicationSteps.checkNoAccessToResource(WebApplicationSteps.java:446) at ✽.Then the string: Robert should not be present in any of the HTTP responses(authorisation.feature:34)

testcase.failure:
Given the access control map for authorised users has been populated........passed And a new browser or client instance........................................passed And the username alice is used..............................................passed And the password password is used...........................................passed And the login page..........................................................passed When the user logs in.......................................................passed And the previously recorded HTTP Requests for viewBobsProfile are replayed using the current session ID.passed Then the string: Robert should not be present in any of the HTTP responses..failed
